TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed ADODC/EOFActionEnum extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: 提供常量以与 Visual Basic 6.0 属性保持兼容。

span.span: Provides constants for compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Visual Basic 6.0 中，`EOFAction`属性用于确定何种操作`ADODC`采用时`EOF`属性为 true。In Visual Basic 6.0, the `EOFAction` property was used to determine what action the `ADODC` takes when the `EOF` property is true. 这些常数启用已从 Visual Basic 6.0 中继续运行而不进行其他修改升级的代码。These constants enable code that has been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to run without additional modification. > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC/EOFActionEnum adDoAddNew = int32(2)

summary.span: 移过最后一条记录会触发 的 事件在当前记录上发生，然后发生自动 事件，然后在新记录上发生 事件。

span.span: Moving past the last record triggers the 's event to occur on the current record, followed by an automatic , followed by a event on the new record.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC/EOFActionEnum adDoMoveLast = int32(0)

summary.span: 将最后一个记录保持为当前记录。

span.span: Keeps the last record as the current record.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC/EOFActionEnum adStayEOF = int32(1)

summary.span: 移过 的末尾会触发 的 事件在最后一条记录上发生；然后在无效的 () 记录上发生 事件。

span.span: Moving past the end of a triggers the 's event on the last record, followed by a event on the invalid () record.

summary.span: 此时，将禁用 上的“移到下一条记录”按钮。

span.span: At this point, the **MoveNext** button on the is disabled.
